verbose_text: Akt phosphorylation was not substantially changed by treatment with Ab27 and Ab79, suggesting that other intracellular signaling activities were involved in phosphorylation of p27 Kip1 in vivo, for example, JNK XREF_BIBR, leading to cytosolic p27 Kip1 playing a pro migratory role.
evidence: JNK  XREF_BIBR , leading to cytosolic p27 Kip1
